actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to permit credit for civil service retirement purposes in the case of National Guard technician service before January 1, 1969, where the individual performs creditable service on or after such date (whether or not as such a technician).

summary.text: Permits credit, for civil service retirement purposes, for National Guard technicians in service before January 1, 1969 where such an individual performs creditable service after such date. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8332(b))

titles.title: A bill to permit credit for civil service retirement purposes in the case of National Guard technician service before January 1, 1969, where the individual performs creditable service on or after such date (whether or not as such a technician).
